componentAttributes.labelThankYou: Thank you for your interest in applying to Climate Corps. Please fill out the information below.
componentAttributes.pillNames: Dashboard | Contact | Education | Background | Preferences | Cover Letter
componentAttributes.pillURLs: home | contactinfo | educationinformation | backgroundinformation | preferences | coverletter

componentAttributes.additionalInformationIcon: Please add any additional information that is not already reflected in your application, cover letter, or resume that you would like the review team to know.
componentAttributes.contactInformationIcon: Please provide the contact information for three references, at least 2 of which are professional and 1 of which is a supervisor. References will be contacted via email during the interview phase. You will receive notice prior to your references being contacted.
componentAttributes.lblNotesReference: List your relationship to this reference and any additional information you'd like to share with EDF
componentAttributes.levelOfExperienceCoverLetter: You may address your cover letter to the Climate Corps Team. Please describe any specific courses, qualifications, skills and experience (academic and professional) that have prepared you for the Climate Corps Fellowship. Finally, please describe how a Climate Corps fellowship will impact your career.
componentAttributes.saveSuccessMessage: Cover Letter & Resume Saved. Please proceed for Review & Submit
componentAttributes.uploadResumePdf: Upload your resume as a PDF document. To the extent possible, please customize your resume by highlighting relevant experience including professional work experience, internships, academic coursework, volunteer experience or other extracurricular. PDFs should not exceed 1 MB in size.
